title: Project Planning and Kickoff
description: Initiate the project, gather requirements, define project scope, and create a detailed project plan.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data ingestion, processing, storage, and analysis components. The architecture should consider scalability, fault tolerance, security best practices, and data governance. Identify the necessary components, their interactions, the technologies to be used, and the data flow between components. Also, outline the deployment strategy, infrastructure requirements, and implementation plan. This will involve selecting appropriate tools, defining APIs, creating database schemas, and configuring cloud services as needed. The architecture design should accommodate future growth, changes in technology, and regulatory compliance. Upon completion, the design document will be reviewed by the technical team and updated as necessary.

title: Data Ingestion
description: Implement data ingestion mechanisms to collect data from various supply chain planning, execution, and real-time status providers.

title: Data Processing and Transformation
description: Develop data processing and transformation pipelines to clean, enrich, and standardize the ingested data.

title: Data Lake Implementation
description: Design and implement the data lake solution for storing and managing the processed data.

title: Data Analysis and Reporting
description: Develop analytical tools and reporting mechanisms to extract insights from the data lake.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and implement a user interface for interacting with the data analysis and reporting tools.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure data privacy and integrity.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to ensure the quality and reliability of the solution.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the solution to production environments and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation and provide training for end-users and support staff.
